column1: 311211,Anaesthetic Technician,,"Adjust settings or positions of medical equipment
column3: Assist health care practitioners during examinations or treatments
column5: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column11: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column13: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column15: Gather medical information from patient histories
column17: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
column19: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column21: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
